description: Lois London is a Marvel Comics character, associated with the Dazzler. She first appeared in Dazzler #22 (December, 1982), and was created by writer Danny Fingeroth and artist Frank Springer.  She reappears in the X-Men franchise in 2009 as a villain, calling herself Mortis.
name: Mortis
powers: Creates an energy field that disrupts solid matter.
